instructions:
In a medium size bowl, mix Bisquick and sugar with a fork. Cut in butter with two knives or wire pastry
blender to small pea size chunks. Add boiling water and whisk vigorously with a fork for 80 to 100 strokes.
With floured fingers, pat dough evenly into a 9 inch Pyrex pie dish, bringing dough up to edge of dish. Bake
in a 450 F oven for 12 to 14 minutes or until brown around the edge.
Rinse and remove stems from strawberries. Put strawberries in a flat bottom bowl, add 2 tbsp of sugar
and crush strawberries. Add sugar as desired. Serve over shortcake. 
*(Rev. 6/8/00)*
ingredients: 1/4 cup (1/2 stick) cold butter or margarine
name: Strawberry Shortcake
